name: TimelineProviderContext
desc: An object that contains details about how a widget is rendered, including its size and whether it appears in the widget gallery.

items.name: let isPreview: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates when the widget appears in the widget gallery.

items.name: let family: WidgetFamily
items.desc: The user-configured family of the widget: small, medium, or large.

items.name: let displaySize: CGSize
items.desc: The size, in points, of the widget.

items.name: let environmentVariants: TimelineProviderContext.EnvironmentVariants
items.desc: All environment values that might be set when a widget appears.

items.name: struct EnvironmentVariants
items.desc: A structure containing all varieties of environments where a widget could appear.
